column1: '''Dr. Andrew Philip Broad''' is a software programmer and designer from the greater Manchester area. He designed ''[[Manic Miner: The Hobbit]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/manicminer.html Manic Miner: The Hobbit] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 22 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Manic Miner: The Hobbit] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 22 April 2011)</ref> and ''[[Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings]]''
column2: <ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/jetsetwilly.html Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 24 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 24 April 2011)</ref> two Tolkien-themed expansions of original games.
